Articles.Content:
It says that there is a problem with the mapping, outcome is i cannot use the containers; I could see the kerbal items, but cannot use them. says it cannot find the sound file, but when i looked i saw it there.
Message:

Sound File: KIS/Sounds/containerOpen has not been found, please check installation path! 
Sound File: KIS/Sounds/containerClose has not been found, please check installation path!

Not sure how to re install mod,
i delete it and unzip a new one and put it there... not working
